I am an **applied economist** and a **data analytics teacher** at State University of New York at Geneseo.

My research interests lie in **environmental and resource economics**, **energy economics**, and **climate change policy**.

My teaching interests are in **economics and data analytics**. My students use the tools of machine learning, econometrics, and data visualization to address **business strategies**, **public policy**, and **individual decision-making**.

Here is my [**curriculum vitae**](choe-cv.pdf){target="_blank"}.
